name: FastGo Running
description: Destroy the targets, score points and open new levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 272 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 272 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
